metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8583 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
mod_wsgi before 4.2.4 for Apache, when creating a daemon process group,does not properly handle when group privileges cannot be dropped, whichmight allow attackers to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8583` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-wsgi - 3.4-4ubuntu2.1.14.04.2
libapache2-mod-wsgi-py3 - 3.4-4ubuntu2.1.14.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mod-wsgi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4-4ubuntu2.1.14.04.2').
